ActEmployment Insurance Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Employment Insurance Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EMPLOYMENT INSURANCE REGULATIONS, in order to (1) provide claimants with clarity and direction with respect to their responsibilities to seek and accept all suitable employment; (2) better enable Service Canada staff to monitor claimantsâ€™ eligibility and ensure claimants are fulfilling their responsibilities; and (3) support claimants to return to work faster.
